title: Nordstrom’s Fall Sale Has Landed — Here Are The 22 Best Fashion Finds
description: Fall is the perfect time to rethink your style direction. After all, the change in temperature calls for a switch in fabrics, silhouettes, and even mood. It’s also an opportunity to stock up on wardrobe must-haves or experiment with a trend you’ve been eyeing, with all the seasonal sales. One of the most anticipated ones is Nordstrom’s. The retailer just rolled out its Fall Sale, and it’s brimming with the best of runway-approved fashion trends, including wide-leg jeans, knee-high boots, metallic sneakers, and Brat green accessories — all up to 60% off. There's truly no time like the present to round out your seasonal wardrobe with these discounted items. If, however, you're feeling overwhelmed by the deluge of quickly-selling pieces, don't worry: We’re here to help. Ahead, we've compiled the best Nordstrom deals across women’s fashion — from Refinery29 reader-favorite brands like Skims, Free People, JW Pei, Dolce Vita, and more — that we think are worth adding to your cart ASAP. Be sure to check back here for new discounted fashion finds before the sale ends on October 28.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.25% off Good American Good author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: Take up to 60% off clothing, shoes, and handbags during Nordstrom’s Fall Sale. Shop discounted fashion from now until October 28.

Photo: Courtesy of Nordstrom.

Fall is the perfect time to rethink your style direction. After all, the change in temperature calls for a switch in fabrics, silhouettes, and even mood. It’s also an opportunity to stock up on wardrobe must-haves or experiment with a trend you’ve been eyeing, with all the seasonal sales. 

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

There's truly no time like the present to round out your seasonal wardrobe with these discounted items. If, however, you're feeling overwhelmed by the deluge of quickly-selling pieces, don't worry: We’re here to help. Ahead, we've compiled the best Nordstrom deals across women’s fashion — from Refinery29 reader-favorite brands like Skims, Free People, JW Pei, Dolce Vita, and more — that we think are worth adding to your cart ASAP.

Be sure to check back here for new discounted fashion finds before the sale ends on October 28.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
